Package com.example.stanza

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AccountCommInterface
    Interface for the sign-in page.
    CommInterface
    A class that will help interact with the CommThread
    ItemTouchHelperAdapter
    An interface to allow a RecyclerView to respond to swipe and drag events.
    PoemRecyclerAdapter.OnItemClickListener
    An interface for providing click functionality for each poem in a RecyclerView
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Account
    This class authenticates the user
    AccountCommThread
    This class is used to communicate with the backend server regarding accounts.
    ApplicationTest
    Testing Fundamentals
    BuildConfig  
    CommThread
    This class is used to communicate with the backend server regarding poems.
    DBOpen2
    A class for friendslist management with the database
    DBOpenHelper
    A class for creating a database and storing necessary info.
    EditPoemActivity
    A class for editing personal poems, with added rhyming functionality from the Wordnik api.
    FriendBoardFragment
    A class representing the Friends Board fragment, which contains a list of the user's friend's poems.
    ItemTouchHelperCallback
    A class to define the interaction between ItemTouchHelper and the application.
    LoginActivity
    A class to allow the user to login to the Stanza ap.
    MainActivity  
    ManageFriendsActivity
    A class to manage your friends list
    NotesProvider
    A class for retrieving the notes from our table in the database
    NotesProvider2
    This is the ContentProvider for the myFriends table in the friends database (the local database that stores who the friends of this user are.
    Poem
    A class for sending a poem over the network to the database
    PoemRecyclerAdapter
    An Adapter to provide binding from a data set of poems to card views that are displayed within a RecyclerView.
    R  
    R.anim  
    R.attr  
    R.bool  
    R.color  
    R.dimen  
    R.drawable  
    R.id  
    R.integer  
    R.layout  
    R.menu  
    R.string  
    R.style  
    R.styleable  
    SignupActivity
    A class to allow a user to create an account for the Stanza app.
    UserPoemFragment
    A class representing the User Poem fragment, which contains a list of the user's poems.
    ViewPoemActivity
    A class for viewing poems without editing them.
